metadata.title: CVE-2019-6290 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: An infinite recursion issue was discovered in eval.c in Netwide Assembler(NASM) through 2.14.02. There is a stack exhaustion problem resulting frominfinite recursion in the functions expr, rexp, bexpr and cexpr in certainscenarios involving lots of '{' characters. Remote attackers could leveragethis vulnerability to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted asm file.

criterions.comment: nasm package in xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2019-04-25').
